mapper.select: SELECT M.NAME AS NAME, D.DIVISIONNAME AS DIVISIONNAME FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN DIVISION D ON M.DIVISION = D.DIVISION WHERE ID = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET DIVISION = '99' WHERE ID = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT M.ID AS ID, O.ORDERSNO AS ORDERSNO, O.PRODUCTNO AS PRODUCTNO, O.SYS_DATE AS SYS_DATE, O.PNAME AS PNAME, O.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY, O.DELIVERY AS DELIVERY, O.P_PHOTO1NAME AS PHOTO1NAME, FORMAT(O.PRICE,0) AS PRICE FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDERS O ON M.ID = O.ID WHERE M.ID = #{id};

SELECT R.REVIEWNO AS REVIEWNO, R.PRODUCTNO AS PRODUCTNO, P.PNAME AS PNAME, R.CONTENTS AS CONTENTS, R.SYS_DATE AS SYS_DATE, R.RATING AS RATING FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON R.PRODUCTNO = P.PRODUCTNO WHERE R.ID = #{id} ORDER BY REVIEWNO DESC;
SELECT ID as id, PHONE as phone, ADDRESS as address FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD = #{password}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{fulladdress} WHERE ID = #{id};
UPDATE MEMBER SET CONFIRM = 1 WHERE ID = #{id};
UPDATE ORDERS SET DELIVERY = 3 WHERE ORDERSNO = #{ordersno}
